title: Mobile Microlearning Design for Information Literacy Enhancement

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: A course focused on cultivating information literacy in social contexts for pre-service and in-service teachers, offering a flexible learning environment utilizing personal devices (BYOD).

learning_goals: Learners can analyze real-world cases by applying a 3-stage framework for evaluating the credibility of diverse online information sources
Learners can design effective academic search strategies in mobile environments and integrate them into social studies teaching materials
Learners can submit project outputs that repurpose digital content in accordance with information ethics principles
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
